name: Muv-Luv Alternative
description: Playtime's over. Time for despair. Experience the definitive version of a masterpiece in the Muv-Luv trilogy's thrilling conclusion. Note: therapy not included.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1024x768 Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: Windows 8.1 / 10 Tablets - Intel Atom Z, Microsoft Surface Pro 4, Samsung Galaxy Book Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 16:9 high resolution display Storage: 4 GB available space
